features: A full skeleton set of js, images, css etc folders, editor config files, package.json and npm shrinkwrap, README.md, etc.
SCSS, with live reloading, autoprefixer, a nice web font and border-box
RequireJS, with the JSON and text plugins (used to load templates)
Live data binding, via the incredibly simple ractive.js
Useful inbuilts, provided by agave.js, loaded with the 'av' prefix.
A small local server provded by 'gulp'
